title: WHIRLING F1 / ELEVATOR
description:
1. You experience the lovely elevator and wonder what it was used for.
2. You can go up and down.

dialogueTree.title: Elevator: "The elevator stands open, inviting..."
dialogueTree.text: The elevator stands open, inviting you to step inside.

links.title: Logic: "This elevator must have been used t..."
links.text: This elevator must have been used to transport pinball machines to and from the upstairs workshop.

links.title: You: "Look at the elevator controls."
links.text: Look at the elevator controls.

links.title: Elevator: "There are large rectangular buttons..."
links.text: There are large rectangular buttons: 'Monter', 'Descendre', and an international: 'Call for Emergency Assistance'. That third one appears to be broken.

links.title: Encyclopedia: "A small steel plaque reads 'Halter..."
links.text: A small steel plaque reads 'Halter 800'. Halter is a Königsteiner lift company who went out of business a long, long time ago.

links.title: You: ""It says the last maintenance was i..."
links.text: "It says the last maintenance was in '88."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That it does." The lieutenant peek..."
links.text: "That it does." The lieutenant peeks in. "I say -- let's brave it."

links.title: You: ""This elevator was last maintained..."
links.text: "This elevator was last maintained in the *future*?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No, it was maintained in '88 of th..."
links.text: "No, it was maintained in '88 of the *previous* century."

links.title: You: ""So it's *not* a message from the f..."
links.text: "So it's *not* a message from the future?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No, I think the bureaucrats just f..."
links.text: "No, I think the bureaucrats just forgot about this back-room elevator after the Revolution."

links.title: You: ""That's disappointing.""
links.text: "That's disappointing."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""If some form of time travel become..."
links.text: "If some form of time travel becomes possible in the future, I doubt its inventors will use it to repair elevators in Martinaise,” the lieutenant responds with a grave voice.

links.title: You: ""That means it's not really that sa..."
links.text: "That means it's not really that safe, is it."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Look on the bright side: if it fai..."
links.text: "Look on the bright side: if it fails, we will only sustain minor injuries. I'm talking three, maybe four months in the hospital. Maximum five."

links.title: You: ""Eighty-eight... This elevator was..."
links.text: "Eighty-eight... This elevator was maintained a long time ago."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""At the end of the last century." H..."
links.text: "At the end of the last century." He nods. "Look on the bright side. If it fails, we will only sustain minor injuries -- I'm talking three, maybe four months in the hospital. maximum five."

links.title: Rhetoric: "It appears his whole enthusiasm is..."
links.text: It appears his whole enthusiasm is sarcastic.

links.title: You: ""This elevator must have been neede..."
links.text: "This elevator must have been needed to transport the pinball machines up and down."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Seems so, although it's pretty......"
links.text: "Seems so, although it's pretty... quaint for a freight elevator." He taps on the guttering light bulb -- it's golden in the dark.

links.title: You: ""I wonder what this elevator was us..."
links.text: "I wonder what this elevator was used for."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Seems like a small freight elevato..."
links.text: "Seems like a small freight elevator for transporting machinery. For that -- it's pretty quaint." He taps the on the guttering light bulb -- it's golden in the dark.

links.title: You: "Could this have been for moving pin..."
links.text: Could this have been for moving pinball machines up and down?

links.title: Elevator: "Looks like one would fit in there,..."
links.text: Looks like one would fit in there, yes. Although it's also surprisingly human -- in the golden light of that ancient bulb.

links.title: You: "What were you used for, elevator?"
links.text: What were you used for, elevator?

links.title: Elevator: "The deep scratches on the floor sug..."
links.text: The deep scratches on the floor suggest it was used as a freight elevator -- for transporting heavy machinery. And one man.

links.title: You: "(Close the doors and go up.)"
links.text: (Close the doors and go up.)

links.title: Elevator: "The elevator screeches and rattles,..."
links.text: The elevator screeches and rattles, like the belly of some ancient beast, as it carries you upward...

links.title: You: "Go down."
links.text: Go down.

links.title: Elevator: "The elevator lurches and squeaks, l..."
links.text: The elevator lurches and squeaks, like the belly of some ancient beast, as you descend....

links.title: You: "[Leave.]"
links.text: [Leave.]

dialogueTree.title: Elevator: "This small elevator is dimly lit by..."
dialogueTree.text: This small elevator is dimly lit by a bulb that's been glowing for ages. The latticed cage is open, inviting you to step inside.

links.title: You: "Look in."
links.text: Look in.

links.title: Elevator: "Smells of nougat and sweat. Your he..."
links.text: Smells of nougat and sweat. Your head brushes up against the ceiling. There is a control panel to your right -- and just enough room for two people to fit in.

links.title: Perception (Sight): "The maintenance card under the cont..."
links.text: The maintenance card under the control panel reads: 'Last Maintenance: 10 July '88'.

links.title: You: "[Leave.]"
links.text: [Leave.]
